price: Nagsabi sila: “Walang iba ito kundi ang buhay namin sa Mundo, at kami ay hindi mga bubuhayin [para tuusin].”
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
